steps.name: Navigate to URL
steps.description: SESSION FOUNDATION: Always start here - creates browser session and navigates to URL. WORKFLOW: Navigate() → FetchWebpage() → Analysis/Planning → AI Agent or Manual interactions → Verify PROVIDES: Live debugUrl for user, initial page snapshot, persistent session TIP: Always show debugUrl to user before proceeding

steps.name: Fetch Webpage Content
steps.description: DECISION BRAIN: Essential for analysis, planning, and information gathering. PRIMARY USES: Understand page state, locate elements, verify changes, plan next actions FALLBACK ROLE: When screenshot blocked/fails, use this diligently for information FORMAT: html=element discovery & coordinates | markdown=content analysis HYBRID WORKFLOW: Use for decisions → AI agent for precision clicking

steps.name: Send Email
steps.description: Sends an email via Gmail API using the authenticated user's Google profile display name. At least one of recipient_email, cc, or bcc must be provided. Atleast one of subject or body must be provided. Requires `is_html=True` if the body contains HTML and valid `s3key`, `mimetype`, `name` for any attachment.
